We are pleased to announce that development of Trigger Card has commenced today, Dec 20, 2025.
Expected release: Q1~Q2 2026.
-MinYang Tech

content_en:
Minyang Tech website has been completely renewed! 
 I will keep increasing the character count just to test the text limit. 
 I honestly don't know what to write here.. 
 What should I even say? 
 Thank you for using Minyang Tech's games. 
 But really, to be honest, I have nothing to write about. 
 I would like to express my gratitude to all the customers who use Minyang Tech. 
 Thank you. 
 -Minyang Tech

 Thank you.

content_en:
Minyang Tech has updated Section 4 of our existing EULA to address potential legal considerations. 

 [Original]: The Company shall not be held liable for any issues, including PC malfunctions or problems arising from secondary modifications, occurring while the user is playing games developed by the Company. 

 [Updated]: The Company shall not be held liable for any issues, including PC malfunctions, problems arising from secondary modifications, leakage of account information due to user negligence, or data loss caused by the use of unofficial third-party mods, occurring while the user is playing games developed by the Company. 

 Thank you for your continued support. 
 - Minyang Tech
